meanings.definition: To manage or direct the affairs of a business or organization.
meanings.sent1: She administrates the daily operations of the company.
meanings.sent2: The CEO administrates the strategic decisions for the organization.
meanings.sent3: The penguin decided to administrate the fish distribution in the Antarctic.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to administrate the team was like conducting a symphony.
meanings.sent5: He administrates with precision and efficiency, like a skilled conductor leading an orchestra.

meanings.definition: To be in charge of carrying out or implementing a plan or policy.
meanings.sent1: He will administrate the new safety protocols in the workplace.
meanings.sent2: The project manager administrates the project timeline effectively.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was asked to administrate the acorn storage plan.
meanings.sent4: She administrates the rules with a firm hand, like a judge in a courtroom.
meanings.sent5: They administrate the rules fairly and consistently, like referees in a game.
